original_text: He hanged the king of Ai on a tree. He left his body there until evening. At sunset, Joshua told his men to cut the body down. They threw it on the ground outside the city's gate. They covered it with a heap of stones. Those stones are still there today.
korean_text: 그가 또 아이 왕을 저녁 때까지 나무에 달았다가 해 질 때에 명령하여 그의 시체를 나무에서 내려 그 성문 어귀에 던지고 그 위에 돌로 큰 무더기를 쌓았더니 그것이 오늘까지 있더라

sentences.original_text: He hanged the king of Ai on a tree.
He left his body there until evening.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 저녁 때까지 그의 시신을 그곳에 두었다.

sentences.original_text: At sunset, Joshua told his men
sentences.korean_translation: 해 질 때, 여호수아는 그의 부하들에게 말했다.

sentences.original_text: They threw it on the ground
They covered it with a heap of stones.
Those stones are still there today.
